data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Torino push upfield but Davide Massa quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 8, Udinese are pushing forward but Rodrigo De Paul's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 11, Udinese have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
Throw-in for Udinese at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Ball safe as Udinese is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Free kick in a good position for Udinese!
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Torino.
In the minute 19, Davide Massa signals a Torino throw-in in Udinese's half.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Udinese at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In the minute 23, Udinese push forward at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino and Gerard Deulofeu gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Torino defence.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Ignacio Pussetto puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 24, Great play from Rodrigo De Paul to set up the goal.
Torino drives forward and Simone Zaza gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Udinese to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
In the minute 29, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Davide Massa awards the away team a throw-in.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Rodrigo De Paul for Udinese who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 33, Davide Massa signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
Rodrigo De Paul is back on his feet again.
Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Torino close to the penalty box.
Torino's Andrea Belotti gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 36, Davide Massa awards Udinese a goal kick.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
Udinese's Roberto Pereyra has been booked in Turin.
In the minute 37, At Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino, Lyanco has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Udinese in the half of Torino.
In the minute 38, Throw-in high up the field for Udinese in Turin.
Davide Massa signals a throw-in for Udinese, close to Torino's area.
Can Torino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Udinese's half?
In the minute 40, Torino have a goal kick.
Torino to take a throw-in in Udinese territory.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Turin to check on Bram Nuytinck, who is grimacing with pain.
Corner awarded to Torino.
Corner awarded to Torino.
In the minute 43, Bram Nuytinck (Udinese) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Rodrigo Becao.
In the minute 44, Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Torino.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Torino.
Free kick Torino.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, Davide Massa has blown to start the second-half.
The home team replace Nicolas N`Koulou with Armando Izzo.
Marco Giampaolo is making the team's second substitution at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino with Federico Bonazzoli replacing Simone Zaza.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Soualiho Meite with Sasa Lukic. This is the third substitution made today by Marco Giampaolo.
Important block from the Torino defence as Rodrigo De Paul fires in a strike for Udinese.
Torino needs to be cautious. Udinese have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Udinese close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
Free kick for Torino in the half of Udinese.
In the minute 49, Torino have a dangerous throw-in.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Udinese.
Udinese's Marvin Zeegelaar has run offside.
In the minute 51, Mergim Vojvoda (Torino) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Torino in the half of Udinese.
In the minute 53, Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Udinese capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Torino's half?
Goal! Udinese extend their lead to 0-2 through Rodrigo De Paul.
In the minute 54, Roberto Pereyra with an assist there.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Lyanco gets his shot on target but fails to score for Torino.
In the minute 60, Udinese's Gerard Deulofeu gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Torino defender.
Torino needs to be cautious. Udinese have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Udinese in the half of Torino.
Luca Gotti (Udinese) is making a second substitution, with Ilija Nestorovski replacing Gerard Deulofeu.
In the minute 62, Rolando Mandragora is replacing Walace for the away team.
In Turin, Federico Bonazzoli of Torino is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 63, Davide Massa signals a Torino throw-in in Udinese's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Amer Gojak is replacing Mergim Vojvoda for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In the minute 64, Udinese drive forward but Roberto Pereyra is judged offside.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
Udinese are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Andrea Belotti puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 1-2.
In the minute 66, That's a fine assist from Federico Bonazzoli.
Goal! Federico Bonazzoli levels the match at 2-2.
In the minute 67, Andrea Belotti instrumental with a fine assist.
Goal! Ilija Nestorovski gives Udinese a 2-3 lead in Turin.
Roberto Pereyra with an assist there.
In the minute 70, Davide Massa awards the away team a throw-in.
Ignacio Pussetto (Udinese) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ricardo Rodriguez (Torino) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Torino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Udinese's half?
In the minute 73, Davide Massa waits before resuming play because Rodrigo Becao for Udinese is still down.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
Udinese's Rodrigo Becao looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 74, Davide Massa signals a free kick to Torino.
Ball goes out of play for a Udinese goal kick.
In the minute 76, Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
Juan Musso (Udinese) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Udinese in the half of Torino.
Davide Massa signals a throw-in for Udinese, close to Torino's area.
In the minute 78, Udinese have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
Throw-in for Torino close to the penalty box.
Torino to take a throw-in in Udinese territory.
In the minute 81, Davide Massa signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Rodrigo Becao (Udinese) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Kevin Lasagna is on a sub for Ignacio Pussetto for Udinese.
In the minute 82, The away team have replaced Roberto Pereyra with Jean-Victor Makengo. This is the fifth substitution made today by Luca Gotti.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Torino just outside Udinese's area.
Torino apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Ricardo Rodriguez. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
In the minute 85, Torino have a dangerous throw-in.
Davide Massa signals a Torino throw-in in Udinese's half.
In the minute 88, Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sasa Lukic (Torino) has received a yellow card from Davide Massa.
Kevin Lasagna of Udinese gets in a strike, but is off target.
Torino have a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Udinese at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Davide Massa awards the away team a throw-in.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Turin.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Udinese in Turin.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-3.
